credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Norton Spritz
title: Platter
description: Oval, glazed obverse and reverse, with transparent turquoise lead glaze. Molded with relief border of satyrs' masks, winged putto heads, oval wells and quatrefoil wells, all arranged in repeat sequence within rim of platter. Plain cavetto. Central area molded with large high relief female figure in flowing garments, with foot on water jug.
name: Platter
